author: Adam Rogers
title: Death Cuts the Degree of Separation Between You and Covid-19
description: If knowing someone who has died would make the pandemic concrete for someone in the US—real and actionable—how many have to die? Here's the grim math.
content: One of the first things they teach wannabe epidemiologists is the shape of the exponential growth curvehow epidemics spread slowly at first, and then take off like a rocketship as the numbers of infected people double, double, and double. But unless youre act… [+5333 chars]
